azizePortfolyo.name: Azize Portfolio IaC
azizePortfolyo.description: Infrastructure-as-Code project deploying Gitea, ArgoCD, Prometheus Stack, Longhorn and more on a Kubernetes single-node cluster using Helmfile.
azizePortfolyo.longDescription: This project automates the setup of a complete DevOps platform on a single-node Kubernetes cluster. It provides declarative Helm release management with Helmfile, manifest composition with Kustomize, and GitOps-based continuous deployment with ArgoCD. The Gitea Actions CI/CD pipeline automatically tests code changes, builds container images, and updates manifests with commit SHA tags for ArgoCD to deploy. Covers all components from Cilium CNI to Prometheus monitoring stack.

helmfileIac.title: Declarative IaC with Helmfile
helmfileIac.description: All Kubernetes resources defined declaratively with Helmfile. Automatically manages dependency ordering.

gitopsArgocd.title: GitOps with ArgoCD
gitopsArgocd.description: CI pipeline automatically updates image tags in manifests with commit SHA. ArgoCD detects changes and deploys with auto-sync, prune, and self-heal.

monitoringStack.title: Full Monitoring Stack
monitoringStack.description: Comprehensive monitoring with Prometheus metrics, Grafana visualization, and Loki log aggregation.

distributedStorage.title: Longhorn Distributed Storage
distributedStorage.description: Kubernetes-native distributed block storage. Configured as the default StorageClass.

automatedTls.title: Automated TLS Certificates
automatedTls.description: Automatic TLS certificate issuance and renewal with cert-manager and Let's Encrypt.

selfHostedGit.title: Fully Automated CI/CD Pipeline
selfHostedGit.description: git push → test → build → manifest update → ArgoCD deploy. Zero manual intervention with Gitea Actions.
